column1: American families still reeling from COVID-19 will need all the help they can get as our nation recovers.    Don't let Left-wing Democrats in Washington sink our economy with tax hikes. Help us retake the majority in the House this fall: https://t.co/QtwwY54H5q

Medicare for All? $32 trillion.  Green New Deal? $93 trillion.   Progressive Wish List Touted as "COVID-19 Response Bill"? $3 trillion.   Who is going to pay for the Democrats' spending obsession?  Hardworking middle-class American families.   These are the stakes this November.

1/ We’ve asked our health care workers our first responders our law enforcement personnel workers at meatpacking facilities and many others to show up for work to do their jobs despite the COVID-19 crisis.

Just some of the things jammed through by House Democrats last night:  COVID-19 payments for illegals? ✅  Get out of jail free cards for prisoners? ✅  More $$ for sanctuary cities? ✅  Just a glimpse of what is at stake in November.    Help us stop them: https://t.co/QtwwY5miu0
